message.body: I'm gonna just buy them kits. I'm not gonna make it a present.
You can contribute if you're interested in knowing too, but I am doing this for me to make my results more accurate, so I don't want to make it into a present
Ok that mashes sense not doing it as gifts
Yeah. I bought one for Dad, Mom, and Grandma.
Haha Victor said he'll help chip in. He wanted to do it but doesn't want someone to have his saliva (you know how he gets).
I'm obsessed and usually don't get things for myself haha so this makes up for that. I have to stop thinking about it once and for all
So weird lol but yea I know.. im going to do eventually. I keep putting it off bec im trying to pay off credit cards
Steph's came in the mail yesterday. We got home late so she didn't do it yet but ill let you know when she sends it out
Did you decide which one you're getting?
Maybe the 23 and me one but idk.. I might do both
I got them all 23andme. Everyone seems to talk better about it. I hope I like my results as much
